name: TRASH ONLY
description:
TRASH ONLY This world is just too clean - Joey Junk Tuck the Trash Can

Before the cleaning supplies attacked, Tuck actually helped make the world a cleaner place.  People would have garbage they needed to get rid of, and Tuck would happily take it. The problem is that prior to the cleaning supply takeover there was a balance. The humans were always cleaning and in the process they would give Tuck their trash.  Now the cleaning supplies eradicate any garbage that exists so Tuck no longer has landfills of his lovely trash to swim through.

Harold

I am not going to elaborate on this one. His name is Harold and he is a happy little lad.

Joey Junk

Crumpled and forgotten. Was he a thrown away drawing? A paper toss  in an office that missed the garbage bin?  Maybe he was just the remains of a hamburger wrapper? No one knows, but Joey certainly doesn't care. He hides behind his sunglasses and drifts throughout the world.
